statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patient_data WHERE blood_type = 'O+'
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE weight_kg BETWEEN 50.00 AND 70.00
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, height_cm FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE blood_type = 'O-' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data ORDER BY age, patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, gender, weight_kg, height_cm FROM patient_data WHERE weight_kg > 60 AND height_cm > 170;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, height, weight FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'A+';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM HealthRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT name, age, height, weight FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'AB+';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE temperature BETWEEN 98.6 AND 100.5 AND diagnosis LIKE '%Flu%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, MIN(heart_rate) AS min_heart_rate, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM HealthRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 3;

SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, HealthRecords.heart_rate, HealthRecords.blood_pressure FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_name, record_date, blood_pressure FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, recommendation_text FROM patients JOIN recommendations ON patients.patient_id = recommendations.patient_id WHERE recommended_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT patient_name, age, blood_pressure, recommended_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id JOIN recommendations ON patients.patient_id = recommendations.patient_id WHERE blood_sugar > 100 ORDER BY recommended_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, condition, diagnosis_date FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords JOIN Patients ON HealthRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, condition, diagnosis_date FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE age < 30;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'A';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients INNER JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type, test_name, result_value, unit FROM Patients INNER JOIN LabResults ON Patients.patient_id = LabResults.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, recommendation_text FROM Patients INNER JOIN Recommendations ON Patients.patient_id = Recommendations.patient_id;
